row.process:
:PRINT 'ENVIRONMENT=&ENVIRONMENT#' :PRINT 'JENKINSPATH=&JENKINSPATH#' :PRINT 'DEVJENKINS_PARM=&DEVJENKINS#'
:IF &REGION# = 'dc3' &CASHSTARTCMD jenkins-scheduler -appArgs &JENKINSPATH# -p environment='&ENVIRONMENT#-&REGION#' -p profile='&PROFILE_DC3#' -p action='&ACTION#' -s -v &DEVJENKINS# :ELSE &CASHSTARTCMD jenkins-scheduler -appArgs &JENKINSPATH# -p environment='&ENVIRONMENT#-us-&REGION#-1' -p profile='&PROFILE_AWS#' -p action='&ACTION#' -s -v &DEVJENKINS# :ENDIF
